meanings.definition: The quality or state of being translucent.
meanings.sent1: The translucencies of the glass allowed soft light to filter through.
meanings.sent2: The artist used different translucencies in the painting to create depth.
meanings.sent3: The translucencies of the jellyfish made it look like a floating lantern.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a certain translucencies, revealing her emotions effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The translucencies of the ice made it shimmer like a diamond under the sun.

meanings.sent1: The room was filled with various translucencies, from glass to plastic.
meanings.sent2: She studied the different translucencies of the materials under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The translucencies of the bubbles in the drink made it look like a science experiment.
meanings.sent4: The translucencies of the clouds painted a beautiful picture in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The translucencies of the leaves created a magical play of light and shadow on the ground.
